channel.title: [Hammer Editor] Non-quad displacement error
channel.description:
When trying to compile my map, I keep getting a "Trying to create non-quad displacement!" error in the compile log. The thing is, I have made all of my displacements four-sided brushes, and every brush that should have a complex shape I've made into a func_detail. Am I missing something here?
============================================================================================================================================ ** Executing... ** Command: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Black Mesa\bin\vbsp.exe" ** Parameters: -game "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Black Mesa\bms" "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Black Mesa\bms\mapsrc\Custom\elisla_m1a1.vmf" ============================================================================================================================================ Valve Software - vbsp.exe (Dec 17 2018) 8 threads materialPath: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Black Mesa\bms\materials Loading C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Black Mesa\bms\mapsrc\Custom\elisla_m1a1.vmf Trying to create a non-quad displacement! (entity 0, brush 0)
============================================================================================================================================ The command failed.
** Command: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Black Mesa\bin\vbsp.exe" ** Parameters: -game "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Black Mesa\bms" "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Black Mesa\bms\mapsrc\Custom\elisla_m1a1.vmf"

============================================================================================================================================ The command failed.

item.title: [Hammer Editor] Non-quad displacement error
item.dc:creator: SuperNexus
item.description:
When trying to compile my map, I keep getting a “Trying to create non-quad displacement!” error in the compile log. The thing is, I have made all of my displacements four-sided brushes, and every brush that should have a complex shape I’ve made into a func_detail. Am I missing something here?
